heading: HR01762
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, ON THE ALLEGED  TORTURE AND THE FRUSTRATED MURDER OF TWO SMALL SCALE MINERS INCLUDING A MINOR IN MACO, COMPOSTELA VALLEY AND EXPRESS THE URGENT NEED FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ENACT LEGISLATION TO REPEAL THE MARTIAL LAW EXTENSION IN MINDANAO
principal-authors: BROSAS, ARLENE D.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-03-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01762
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, ON THE ALLEGED TORTURE AND THE FRUSTRATED MURDER OF TWO SMALL SCALE MINERS INCLUDING A MINOR IN MACO, COMPOSTELA VALLEY AND EXPRESS THE URGENT NEED FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ENACT LEGISLATION TO REPEAL THE MARTIAL LAW EXTENSION IN MINDANAO
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BROSAS, ARLENE D., DE JESUS, EMMI A., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
